description: This file defines a React component 'BookDetails' which displays detailed information about a single book, including handling for missing book data and image load failures.

methods.name: BookDetails
methods.description: Main React functional component that fetches and displays detailed info about a specific book based on URL parameters.

methods.name: handleImgError
methods.description: Handles image load errors by swapping the src to a fallback image and setting a marker attribute to prevent repeated fallback handling.
